Name: Legion Tale
About the game: Overview Legion Tale is a turn based tactic set in a medieval continent of Agia. Follow the story of a great war between two races, where you are the leader of a small legion putting your life to restore the world after the ambush of the Dark Lord's forces. As you progress, you'll uncover a hidden truth behind the never-ending conflict that engulfs the continent since a long time ago between the ruling states. We implemented tactical combo battle system, inspired by games like Legend of the Dragoon. To create continuous attacks, the player needs to immediately click the combo's circle when it is inside the attack's circle. Features A story inspired by a lot of classic tactical games. Enjoy up to 30 chapters of epic battles. Tactical Combo Battle System (TCBS). Affinity Triangle. (Strength > Wisdom > Agility > Strength) Beautiful, carefully designed pixel art combat animations. Linear story with beautiful hand-drawn background painting. Challenging turn-based combat, each with various kind of objectives from Kill Targets, Survive, Escape, and Elimination. Meet 10 different heroes and follow their story.
